entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 3.
